pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-1481
pullRequest.bodyText:
Improved error message for when user tries to register member while token is not logged in.
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-1481

commit.message: XRDDEV-1481: Improve error message for when user tries to register member with certificates token not logged in

nodes.bodyText:
Making modifications to texts shown in UI by changing signer code, which is not aware of UI, and has also other non-UI users, is a bit suspect. This exception is also thrown at least to xroad-proxy, signer-cli, and in theory could by unwanted in those. It is just a text change so the probability of it breaking things should be minimal, though.
Maybe we should add a way to define core error messages (or overrides to default messages) inside proxy-ui-api module.
Let's work on this if we get more of these UI-rooted needs to change error messages. Now next release is quite soon, there's no sense in opening this issue more at this point.
